actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional U.S. district judges.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to appoint, by and with the consent of the Senate, two additional district judges for the southern district of Florida, one additional district judge for the northern district of Indiana, one additional district judge for the southern district of Indiana, one additional district judge for the western district of Missouri, and one additional district judge for the northern district of Texas.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the appointment of additional U.S. district judges.
